alert.note: Alert for Jo Daviess (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 08 at 4:34AM CST until January 08 at 12:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Visibility down to one quarter mile or less at times in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Illinois and east central, northeast and southeast Iowa. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Moisture from the fog could freeze on pavement leading to slippery conditions. Motorists should slow down and be extra cautious on bridges and overpasses.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
